00062 /* --- Allocation / MMU section --- */
00063 
00064 static inline void *comedi_kmalloc(int size)
00065 {
00066         return rtdm_malloc(size);
00067 }
00068 
00069 static inline void comedi_kfree(void *pinp)
00070 {
00071         rtdm_free(pinp);
00072 }
00073 
00074 static inline int __comedi_copy_from_user(rtdm_user_info_t * user_info,
00075                                           void *pind, void *pins, int size)
00076 {
00077         if (rtdm_read_user_ok(user_info, pins, size))
00078                 return rtdm_copy_from_user(user_info, pind, pins, size);
00079         else
00080                 return -EFAULT;
00081 }
00082 
00083 static inline int __comedi_copy_to_user(rtdm_user_info_t * user_info,
00084                                         void *pind, void *pins, int size)
00085 {
00086         if (rtdm_rw_user_ok(user_info, pind, size))
00087                 return rtdm_copy_to_user(user_info, pind, pins, size);
00088         else
00089                 return -EFAULT;
00090 }

00123 static inline void comedi_udelay(unsigned int us)
00124 {
00125         rtdm_task_busy_sleep(((nanosecs_rel_t) us) * 1000);
00126 }

00147 struct comedi_irq_descriptor {
00148         /* These fields are useful to launch the IRQ trampoline;
00149            that is the reason why a structure has been defined */
00150         comedi_irq_hdlr_t handler;
00151         unsigned int irq;
00152         void *cookie;
00153         rtdm_irq_t rtdm_desc;
00154 };
